alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jefferson; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jefferson, southeastern Hardin and northwestern Orange Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Lumberton, moving south at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Vidor, Pine Forest, Lakeview and Weiss Bluff. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
